definition: mellow and full/suave/smooth and round/rich (in voice)
circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)

sentences.english: Full-bodied, soft and round, with a long finish.
sentences.chinese: 酒体丰腴，柔和而圆润，回味隽永。

sentences.english: Her tiny, round lips were full like a tulip bulb.
sentences.chinese: 两片小而圆润的嘴唇好似郁金香的球茎般丰满。

sentences.english: I learned to use a soft voice to oil my words.
sentences.chinese: 我已学会用柔音使自已的吐字圆润委婉。

sentences.english: On the palate, the flavours open up unrestrainedly and not without a certain balance and roundness which overwhelm us.
sentences.chinese: 品尝的时候，味道持久地在口中蔓延开，平衡而圆润。

sentences.english: Full bodied, with sweet and round tannins, and a berry and spice aftertaste.
sentences.chinese: 酒体饱满，单宁圆润，回味中有莓果和香料的味道。

sentences.english: Figure with slender, fruity show strength, in strength appearing in the enchanting.
sentences.chinese: 图中用线纤细，圆润秀劲，在劲力中透着妩媚。

sentences.english: Tannic when young, round and elegant if matured.
sentences.chinese: 年轻时丹宁强劲，成熟时优雅而圆润。

sentences.english: The Zenki front bumper was replaced by a smoother, more modern-looking front bumper cover.
sentences.chinese: 其前保险杠变得更加圆润更具现代感。

sentences.english: We listened to a rich voice which rolled out into the dusk.
sentences.chinese: 我们静听暮色苍茫中响起的一个圆润洪亮的声音。

sentences.english: Of watching up thy pregnant lips for more.
sentences.chinese: 期待着你那圆润的双唇再吐音泉。

sentences.english: The dog's comes garnished with a bulbous glacé cherry.
sentences.chinese: 一份狗鞭菜周围用鲜艳圆润的樱桃围边。

sentences.english: A long, aromatic aftertaste rounds this wine out beautifully.
sentences.chinese: 回味持久，圆润，令此酒颇为优雅迷人。

sentences.english: The nine days round beads body, cute.
sentences.chinese: 该九眼天珠珠身圆润，小巧可爱。
浆果的脸颊圆润而可爱。

sentences.english: If this was the awaited mellowing , it was not very pronounced.
sentences.chinese: 如果这就是所等待的圆润，那可不怎么样。

sentences.english: Fine tannins structure with cassis, cigar box, truffle, and chocolate characters.
sentences.chinese: 丹宁圆润，配合着雪茄合，黑松露和巧克力特性。

definition: lit. as round as pearls and as smooth as jade (idiom)/fig. elegant and polished (of singing or writing)
perfectly round/(fig.) accommodating/considerate/smooth (way of doing things)
line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
(of a shape) sharp and clearcut/(of a person) definite in his opinion
Fengman district of Jilin city 吉林市, Jilin province
